info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pike, east central Polk and southwestern Montgomery Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Daisy, or 14 miles north of Murfreesboro, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Daisy... Daisy State Park... Albert Pike Recreation Area... Bear Creek Public Use Area... Fancyhill... Roaring Branch Natural Area... New Hope in Pike County... Lodi... Langley... Shady Lake Recreation Area... Kirby... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
